data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The climate of Japan is predominantly temperate, but varies greatly from north to south. Japan's ____ features ____ it ____ six ____ climatic ____: Hokkaido, Sea ____ Japan, Central Highland, Seto Inland Sea, Pacific Ocean, and Ryukyu Islands. The ____ zone, Hokkaido, has a humid ____ climate ____ long, cold ____ and ____ warm ____ cool ____. Precipitation is not heavy, but the islands usually develop deep snowbanks in the winter.

The northe______ zone, Hokkaido, has a humid conti______ climate wi__ long, cold win____ and ve__ warm t_ cool sum____. Precipitation is not heavy, but the islands usually develop deep snowbanks in the winter.
data.answer: 日本的气候以温和为主，但南北差异很大。日本的地理特征将其分为六个主要气候带:北海道、日本海、中央高地、濑户内海、太平洋和琉球群岛。最北端的北海道是湿润的大陆性气候，冬天漫长寒冷，夏天温暖凉爽。降水量并不大，但岛上在冬天通常会形成厚厚的雪堆。
